description: The Lucas Men and friends are all hanging out at the movies, and Max Arion has a front-row seat with Drake Rogers. Drake is so god-damn cute, and Max Arion is so god-damn hot — it’s no wonder why they’re instantly attracted to one another. They don’t care about the movie, so they start playing with each other dicks instead. Eventually they both ignore the movie entirely, and Max bends Drake over and fucks him in public view for the audience to watch. They make their way to the front of the theater and put on a real show—with Drake on his back spread eagle and Max Arion balls deep in his ass!
title: Max Arion And Drake Rogers’ Movie Theatre Fuck
